text:
Raju uncle, the grocery store owner in my area died due to coronavirus. Although, for last couple of months he had kidney issues but doctors at the hospital said he contracted Corona too. 
I cannot believe my ears as during Ramadan i used to by stuff from him and now he's gone.

text:
#COVID-19: 65 year old man from Handwara dies at #CD hospital, toll reaches to 44
